cast.name: 费尔南多·卢扬 Fernando Luján
沙治奥 · 占门士 Sergio Jiménez
María Eugenia Ríos María Eugenia Ríos

writer.name: 让-玛丽·勒普兰斯·德·博蒙 Jeanne-Marie LePrince de Beaumont

director.name: 阿尔弗雷多·索尔达纳 Alfredo Saldaña

introduction: this telenovela has nothing to do with the beauty and the beast fairytale, was a intense psicological drama, more likely Aghata Christie's novels, is a bunch of people in a manor at an island expecting an heritage, and one by one they been murdered for a extrange beast hidden in the mannor, at the end the killer was the caracter played by actress Tina Romero, she was the young lady in distress during all the soup opera, but was really a psico who ended in a mental institution sorrounded by the gost of the people she killed. that's why the soup opera was called Bella y Bestia (beauty and beast), she was a beautiful young girl and also a bloody greedy beast. A very good thriller.
